Debs Best Recipes  

Linguini Tart

1 baguette, sliced into 1/2 inch pieces
 1/4 cup sundried tomato and oregano dressing
2/3 cup miracle whip
 1/4 cup flour
2 cups milk
 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese
3 cups cooked linguine
 2 eggs beaten
2 cups grated swiss cheese
 3 green onions, sliced

2 tomatoes, sliced

 

Heat oven to 400 degrees.  Brush slices of bread with dressing.  Place slices on baking sheet.  Bake for 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned.  Line bottom and sides of a 10 inch springform pan with bread, allowing bread to come 1 inch over sides.  Reduce heat to 350.  Blend miracle whip and flour in medium saucepan.  Whisk in milk.  Cook, stirring, over medium heat until sauce comes to a boil and thickens.  Remove from heat; stir in parmesan cheese.  Combine cooked linguine with egges, 1 1/4 cups swiss cheese, green onions and cheese sauce.  Pour into prepared crust.  Arrange tomatoes on tart.  Sprinkle with remaining swiss cheese.  Bake 25 minutes.  Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
